title: Birth
content: I was born the 11th of July 200 in Vashi, Navi Mumbai to my parents as their second child. I spent the initial years of my chilhood in Bombay - learning and growing with every new experience

title: Migration to Doha, Qatar
content: In the summer of 2006, My parents, brother I moved to Doha, Qatar for the first time. I did my entire schooling in Doha, at Birla Public School

title: Bronze Medal in World Robotics Olympiad - Arabia
content: As a part of the school's robotic club since a young age, I participated in the Robotics related events. In 2012, My team and I came third in the entire Middle East for the creation of a Welfare Protection Automated Vehicle

title: Silver Medal in National Robotics Olympiad
content: Having taken a year break from the club, I returned to the competitive scene in 2014 where my team and I bagged second place for NRO. For this competition, we programmed and built a prototype for a space elevator for efficient material transfer to and from orbit.

title: Joined School Football Team
content: Being obsessed with sports, especially football, early in 2015, I joined my school's Football Team and immediately rose to the first team - being the youngest member on the team that year

title: Silver medal for School Olympic's Program - Football
content: My three years of involvement with the school's football team came to a bitter-sweet end as we reached the finals of the School Olympics Program for football. Unfortunately, we failed at the last hurdle by a goal. However, the three years I had spent in this team shaped my character

title: Graduated from BPS with CGPA of 94.8%
content: My 12 years of schooling at BPS came to an end in March of 2018. I held the highest score for Computer Science in my school while also graduating in the top 5% of my batch

title: Joined College of Engineering, Guindy, Anna University
content: Pursuing my love for Computer Science, I enrolled for an Honor's Degree in Bachelor's in Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering. As of today, I am now a senior at this university with a CGPA of 9.52 after 6 semesters. I plan on pursuing a Graduate Degree in CS in Fall 2022
